title: Being Bilingual
description: Many people all over the world speak two languages. They are bilingual. In Being Bilingual, readers meet children from different cultures and learn their names and the languages they speak. A pronunciation guide, glossary, and table of contents are included to support readers.
meta: Aztecs, bilingual, Incas, keyboards, language, tribe, weave
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast information
Long Vowel Sounds : Discriminate long /e/ vowel sound
Vowel Digraphs : Identify and read long /e/ vowel digraph ea
Proper Nouns : Recognize and use proper nouns

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
